FwkSenCnt.MEANING: electrical generator used in internal combustion engines

ExCnt.EX: Since then and for the past 30 years he has grown his own business reconditioning magnetos for old motor bikes and cars .
Vehicle electrics and aircraft magnetos were made by 600 employees in 1916 and 1,000 by 1918 .
Since aircraft reciprocating engines use a ( rotating electromagnet ) magneto system and not a coil and distributor electrical system one would not expect the above cited result to apply directly .
